name: Easy Professional Resume Template
description:
This is super easily adjustable template,

contains 1 sidebar and main body.

I made titles into components, so you can easily change the styles or re-name them for the future. I suggest you to check out the color styles as well, I wanted to include nature, neutral and soft palette for the sidebars.

The typography is pretty simple, you can play around with the sizes, but I think you wouldn't need to change much.


For easy building, copy and paste the groups. You don't have to manually write down everything.


I've included proficiency components too.


I made some comments along in the file. Please Check them.
